gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Mavericks 119, Nets 107
gameRecap.excerpt: The Mavericks defeated the Nets, 119-107. Kyrie Irving recorded 36 points (6-10 3PM) and five assists for the Mavericks, with Luka Doncic adding 35 points, 18 rebounds, and nine assists in the victory. Mikal Bridges tallied 28 points and four assists for the Nets in the losing effort. The Mavericks improve to 28-23, while the Nets fall to 20-30.
